docs.snippet: Having proved by the Czechoslovak settlement that they have increased their influence in Europe, Mussolini and Hitler evidently intend to speed up their propaganda campaigns in other parts of the world. Hardly had the Duce left the four-power...
docs.lead_paragraph: Having proved by the Czechoslovak settlement that they have increased their influence in Europe, Mussolini and Hitler evidently intend to speed up their propaganda campaigns in other parts of the world. Hardly had the Duce left the four-power conference at Munich than his Minister of Popular Culture, Dino Alfieri, gave the press a glowing account of Fascist cultural activities in the countries of South America.
docs.abstract: comment on French attitude on settlement

docs.snippet: The century-old Chaco dispute between Bolivia and Paraguay was terminated this afternoon by the arbitral award of the Presidents of Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Peru, the United States and Uruguaty.

docs.snippet: A Foreign Office spokesman said today that the Brazilian Ambassador to Berlin, Dr. Jose Joachim de Lima e Silva Monitz de Aragoa, had been transferred to the Foreign Ministry and would return from Berlin soon.

docs.snippet: Bonds followed an irregular course yesterday in slightly more active trading on the New York Stock Exchange. Further profittaking was in evidence in some of the more speculative issues, sufficient to weaken the price structure as the main body of...
docs.lead_paragraph: Bonds followed an irregular course yesterday in slightly more active trading on the New York Stock Exchange. Further profittaking was in evidence in some of the more speculative issues, sufficient to weaken the price structure as the main body of active bonds closed moderately lower on the day.
